description: This file defines the AppGatewayClient class, which encapsulates methods to call the org.rdk.AppGateway.respond function via an injected RPC mechanism. It manages constructing the request parameters using a consumer context and payload, then invoking the remote procedure.

classes.name: AppGatewayClient
classes.description: A client class to communicate with the AppGateway's respond method over RPC, requiring an injected invokeRpc function for transport.

methods.name: constructor(private readonly invokeRpc: (method: string, params: unknown) => Promise<unknown>)/ constructor
methods.description: Initializes the AppGatewayClient with an RPC invocation function.

methods.name: async respond(consumerCtx: ConsumerContext, payload: unknown): Promise<void> { respond
methods.description: Asynchronously sends a response back to the consumer via the AppGateway, encapsulating request context and payload.
